appInfo: Basic app using a fetch and Advice Slip JSON API. Written in JS and React.
Simple project of order card summary. Written in JS and React.
Landing page of insure company. Written in JS and React

p1: I’m currently located in Wroclaw, Poland, but I can work remotely. Interested in the entire frontend spectrum and still learning and developing my skills. I’m still learning and exploring the vast world of web development. I am passionate about creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites and applications that enhance the user's experience.
p2: I work in Python, JavaScript, React, and CSS and am constantly expanding my knowledge in these areas. As a beginner in this field, I am always eager to learn new skills and techniques to improve my work and stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies.
p3: I enjoy the challenges that come with developing new projects and take pride in creating clean, well-organized code that is easy to maintain and update. I believe that attention to detail and a strong sense of design are essential to creating high-quality, functional websites that stand out from the crowd.
p4: While I am still in the early stages of my career, I am excited to continue learning and growing as a developer. I am always open to new opportunities to gain experience and expand my skillset, and I am committed to providing the best possible solutions for my clients and their users.
p5: Thank you for taking the time to learn a little more about me and my work as a front-end developer. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or would like to discuss a project. I look forward to working with you!
